tool_description:
More than 315+ competitions implemented (Increasing day by day). The API is dynamic, it gets updated every called endpoint so fresh data is provided to you at any time! Try it with the free plan. 
Documentation and full competitions list: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jX1O0w-elFlrNrP_x27vK-8pYrasIGAJjm_XjO8luJw/edit?usp=sharing
name: Football_v2
title: Football

api_list.name: SquadName
api_list.description: Search a squad in a table by its name. You don't need to search for the full name, you can also use some letters or a part of it.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football98.p.rapidapi.com/premierleague/table/squadname/Liv"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football98.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://football98.p.rapidapi.com/{championship}/table/squadname/{squadname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football98.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
